borrower-card.title: I'm a Borrower
borrower-card.description: And I need to raise funds for my project

investor-card.title: I'm an Investor
investor-card.description: And I want to invest in projects

details-card.title: Expected yield
details-card.description: Join us in building the Green Dream, an environmentally sustainable residential condominium, where comfort meets environmental preservation. With your contribution through our crowdfunding, we can turn this project into reality, offering green spaces, eco-friendly technologies, and unparalleled quality of life. Every donation counts! Join now and be part of this community that values the future of the planet and the well-being of all its inhabitants.

about-borrower.title: About borrower
about-borrower.description: As Usury, the mentor behind this ecological residential project, I am committed to promoting positive change in the construction industry. With extensive experience and a sustainable vision, each contribution is valued and invested with integrity and transparency. Together, we are building more than just houses; we are creating a sanctuary for those who value the environment and quality of life. I am immensely grateful for you joining us on this journey towards a more sustainable and prosperous future for all.

score-card.title: Credit score
score-card.description: Nicholas, a true Carioca at heart, finds joy in the vibrant rhythm of Rio de Janeiro's streets and the soothing sway of its beaches. Yet, beneath the sunny exterior lies a passionate love for One Piece, a world where pirates roam the seas in search of adventure and treasure. From the colorful characters to the epic battles, Nicholas immerses himself in the captivating tale, weaving dreams of distant shores and boundless freedom. With each chapter, his spirit soars, carried on the winds of imagination, as he eagerly awaits the next voyage alongside Luffy and his crew.

transactions-dialog.description: Add to your balance to invest

create-offer-page.fill-goal-amount-and-interest-rate: Fill the total to be received and the interest rate
create-offer-page.fill-goal-amount-and-interest-rate-and-i: Fill the total to be received, the interest rate and the number of installments
create-offer-page.fill-installment-start-date-and-installm: Fill the installment start date and the number of installments
create-offer-page.not-authenticated: You need to be authenticated to create an offer
create-offer-page.not-an-borrower: You're not an borrower, to create an offer you need to be an borrower
create-offer-page.success-toast-message: You offer has been created successfully
create-offer-page.error-toast-message: An error occurred while creating your offer

credit-scores.AAA: Exceptional quality investments. Lower risk of default. They represent maximum security.
credit-scores.AA: High quality investments. Very low default risk. Very safe, but a little less than AAA.
credit-scores.A: Good quality investments. Low default risk. They are considered safe, but with slightly higher risks than AA.
credit-scores.BBB: Medium quality investments. Moderate default risk. Marking the line between investment grade and speculative investments.
credit-scores.BB: Speculative investments. Moderately high default risk. Less safe, with potential for higher returns.
credit-scores.B: Highly speculative investments. High risk of default. Investors must be prepared for possible losses.
credit-scores.CCC: Very poor quality investments. Very high risk of default. Risky investments, with the possibility of high returns or total loss.
credit-scores.CC: Extremely speculative investments. Extremely high default risk. Very risky and usually in a situation of financial difficulties.
credit-scores.C: Precarious investments. Close to default or in default, but still paying. For investors looking for risky bets.
credit-scores.D: Default. The investment failed to meet its financial obligations. The lowest and riskiest category.
